name:
Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate
Update Ver. 1.1
description:
This is update data required to access the "Gift Area" in "Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate", where you can download free items.

In the event that update data (ver. 1.1) hasn't been downloaded, the "Gift Area" in "Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate" cannot be accessed.

After the download, talk to the housekeeper character in your house, select "Downloadable Content", and then "Gift Area". We ask that you please download update data (ver. 1.1), and apologize for any inconvenience.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
